data.actual_result: The typing cursor moves to the end
data.expected_result: The typing cursor shouldn't move to the end
data.short_description: Typing cursor moves to the end when deleting a character or editing a word in Quick Switcher/TAYNE
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Quick Switcher by pressing CMD+K/CTRL+K - Type something in the box - Click on a letter so that the typing cursor moves - Either attempt to add a character/word or press the backspace/delete key to delete the character - Observe
